preview.command:
CAT << EOF
{
  "product": "eventbus",
  "description": "User events collection and distribution for dailymotion frontend applications",
  "domain": "data_platform",
  "wiki": [
    "https://wiki.dailymotion.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=59836952"
  ],
  "onduty": "WH.1",
  "services": [
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://aebed.dm.gg",
      "details": "Private API endpoint for oss streamer events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://aebed-sv4.dm.gg",
      "details": "Private API endpoint for oss streamer events in sv4",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://internaltools.dm.gg",
      "details": "Private API endpoint for internaltools events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://mebed.dm-event.net",
      "details": "Public API endpoint for mobile events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://mebed.dailymotionbus.net",
      "details": "Backup public API endpoint (in case of adblocking) for mobile events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://pebed.dm-event.net",
      "details": "Public API endpoint for player events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://pebed.dailymotionbus.net",
      "details": "Backup public API endpoint (in case of adblocking) for player events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://webed.dm-event.net",
      "details": "Public API endpoint for website events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "api",
      "location": "https://webed.dailymotionbus.net",
      "details": "Backup public API endpoint (in case of adblocking) for website events",
      "team": "de-vp",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "nsq",
      "location": "",
      "details": "NSQ instance holding events",
      "team": "infra",
      "onduty": "OWH.1"
    },
    {
      "component": "github",
      "location": "https://github.com/dailymotion/edward-ed-golang",
      "details": "Event dispatcher, receive events and route to the correct NSQ queue",
      "team": "de-vp"
    },
    {
      "component": "github",
      "location": "https://github.com/dailymotion/edward-ein",
      "details": "Worker base to consume events from an ed queue",
      "team": "de-vp"
    }
  ]
}
EOF
